status.title: Recess
status.abstract: Comic tales of a group of good friends, four boys and two girls, during breaks in primary school, as they grow up, relate to each other, and have brushes with authority.

status.title: Gravity Fals
status.abstract: Twin siblings Dipper and Mabel Pines spend the summer at their great-uncle's tourist trap in the enigmatic Gravity Falls, Oregon.

status.title: The Black Hole
status.abstract: A research vessel finds a missing ship, commanded by a mysterious scientist, on the edge of a black hole.
